data.text: @TJProvincial Time to quit counting cases irrelevant.
@TJProvincial He'll finally not feel so very alone.
@TJProvincial Not reporting cases daily would help many’s mental health at this point.

@TJProvincial The dashboard isn’t close to accurate. The vast majority of rapid test positive cases never report. The cases are much higher than the dashboard. I don’t see where completely inaccurate stats on a daily basis helps anyone.

@TJProvincial Thank God this man will never be in a position to lead the province. These are the words of a Coward. We need LEADERSHIP. Individual responsibility moving forward - read the room. It's time to move on.
@TJProvincial Doomsday Coon, who didn’t even bother voting on the vaccination of Children. Hard to tel the difference in what is sincere and what is political opportunism.
@TJProvincial I have never even looked at the dashboard once. I think it will be ok
@TJProvincial Why? It isn't an accurate representation of infections because most are self reported anyway. Hasn't been accurate since they stopped widespread PCR testing.
